name: TamaCat
description:
Tamacat is a game that simulates the experience of playing with a cute funny cat that loves to get pet (clicked). The game provides a variety of minigames, skins for your cat and cursor, and the entire game is played with just the use of your mouse. After all that you'll experience a very wholesome ending for a very wholesome game.

Made by:

 Megastrons/Programador/Sonoplasta

Nexuszin/Ilustrador
